2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="WhitespaceAfter">
        <property name="id" value="WhitespaceAfter"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="STRING_LITERAL, CHAR_LITERAL"/>
        <property name="allowLineBreaks" value="false"/>
        <property name="option" value="space"/>
    </module>
    <module name="WhitespaceAfter">
        <property name="id" value="WhitespaceAfter"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_NEW"/>
        <property name="allowLineBreaks" value="false"/>
        <property name="option" value="space"/>
    </module>
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='PackageDeclaration'>
        <property name='id' value='PackageDeclaration'/>
    </module>
    <module name='OneTopLevelClass'>
        <property name='id' value='OneTopLevelClass'/>
    </module>"
}
3.4.2 Ordering of class contents:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='DeclarationOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='declarationOrder'/>
        <property name='order' value='class, interface, enum, annotation, enum_constant, field, constructor, method, static_initializer, instance_initializer, static_block, instance_block'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.2 Nonempty blocks: K & R style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LAMBDA, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="Indentation">
        <property name="basicOffset" value="4"/>
        <property name="caseIndent" value="4"/>
        <property name="throwsIndent" value="4"/>
        <property name="lineWrappingIndentation" value="4"/>
    </module>
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR, BOR_ASSIGN, BSR, BSR_ASSIGN, BXOR, BXOR_ASSIGN, COLON, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LCURLY, LE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, LOR, LT, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, QUESTION, SL, SLIST, SL_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, TYPE_PARAMETER, TYPE_UPPER_BOUND'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='RPAREN'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='TYPE'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='VARIABLE_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='ModifierOrder'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="PackageName">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z0-9]+(\\.[a-z0-9]+)*$"/>
        <property name="illegalFormat" value="^[A-Z]|_"/>
        <property name="message" value="Package name must be in lowercase and not contain underscores"/>
    </module>
}
5.2.2 Class names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreAnnotations' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreInterfaceModifiers' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreInterfaceTypeParameters' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignorePrimitiveTypes' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreTypeNames' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
6.2 Caught exceptions: not ignored:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="EmptyCatchBlock">
        <property name="id" value="emptyCatchBlock"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_CATCH"/>
        <property name="allowCommentedBlocks" value="false"/>
    </module>
}

7.1.3 Block tags:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="JavadocBlockTagLocation">
        <property name="allowLineBreaks" value="true"/>
        <property name="option" value="same"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="PARAM, RETURN, THROWS, DEPRECATED"/>
    </module>
    <module name="JavadocBlockTagLocation">
        <property name="allowLineBreaks" value="true"/>
        <property name="option" value="indent"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="PARAM, RETURN, THROWS, DEPRECATED"/>
    </module>
}
7.2 The summary fragment:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='SummaryJavadoc'>
        <property name='forbiddenSummaryFragments' value='A{@code, Thismethodreturns, Savetherecord'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadoc' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocReturn' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocThrows' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocParam' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocOverridingMethod' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocMethod' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocConstructor' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocPackage' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocClass' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocField' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocType' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocMethodTypeParameter' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocTypeParameter' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocVariable' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocEnumConstant' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocAnnotationType' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocLambdaParameter' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocRecordComponent' value='false'/>
        <property name='scope' value='public'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, RECORD_DEF, RECORD_COMPONENT_DEF, TYPE_PARAMETER, LAMBDA_PARAMETER'/>
    </module>"
}
7.3 Where Javadoc is used:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="JavadocType">
        <property name="scope" value="public"/>
    </module>
    <module name="JavadocVariable">
        <property name="scope" value="public"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadoc" value="false"/>
    </module>
    <module name="JavadocMethod">
        <property name="scope" value="public"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadoc" value="false"/>
    </module>
    <module name="JavadocPackage">
        <property name="allowMissingJavadoc" value="false"/>
    </module>
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="MissingOverride">
        <property name="id" value="MissingOverride"/>
        <property name="scope" value="method"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="METHOD_DEF"/>
    </module>
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="JavadocType">
        <property name="scope" value="non-required"/>
    </module>
    <module name="JavadocMethod">
        <property name="scope" value="non-required"/>
    </module>
}
4.8.5.2 Class annotations:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ClassAnnotation'>
        <property name='id' value='ClassAnnotation'/>
        <property name='format' value='separateLine'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.5.3 Method and constructor annotatio:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="AnnotationLocation">
        <property name="id" value="AnnotationLocation"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF"/>
        <property name="format" value="sameLine"/>
    </module>
    <module name="AnnotationUseStyle">
        <property name="id" value="AnnotationUseStyle"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF"/>
        <property name="allowSingleLine" value="true"/>
        <property name="allowSingleParameterlessAnnotation" value="true"/>
    </module>
}
3.4.2.1 Overloads: never split:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OverloadMethodsDeclarationOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='overloadMethodsDeclarationOrder'/>
        <property name='sameName' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameNameText' value='Methods of a class that share the same name appear in a single contiguous group with no other members in between.'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.4.1 Indentation:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.4.2 Fall-through: commented:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='FallThrough'>
        <property name='id' value='fallthrough'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CASE_GROUP'/>
        <property name='commentPattern' value='// fall through'/>
    </module>"
}
